main_definition: The term 'teens' refers to two distinct concepts: the age group of individuals between 13-19 years old, commonly known as adolescents, and a unit of measurement in length equivalent to ten units shorter than twenty feet.

meanings_and_examples.example: When discussing teenagers' behavior or health issues, we often refer to the 'teens' age group which is between 13 and 19 years old.
A piece of fabric measuring ten feet in length can be described as having a teen measurement, as it is ten units shorter than twenty feet.
